name: 6th World Congress on Physical Therapy and Rehabilitation Medicine
content: It’s a great pleasure to invite you to the 6th World Congress on Physical Therapy and Rehabilitation Medicine (PTRM ROME) scheduled from October 04-05, 2023, in Rome, Italy. Avail of this unique opportunity to attend an in-person meeting or join us virtually for a 2-day brainstorming session around the theme “Innovate, Integrate, and Celebrate” which aims to educate the attendees about the current challenges in healthcare and allied health, provide insight on the latest trends, and to explore the future of Physical Therapy and Rehabilitation Medicine.
